entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
